title: feat: Add GitHub Copilot instructions
description:
## Summary

Adds comprehensive GitHub Copilot instructions for the TdsLib repository, a C# TDS protocol implementation library.

## Changes

- Added project overview and architecture documentation
- Documented repository structure with layer explanations (Buffer, IO, Packet, Message, Payload, Token)
- Defined coding conventions (naming, file organization, async patterns)
- Added XML documentation requirements for public APIs
- Included testing guidelines with xUnit and Moq patterns
- Added build commands and CI/CD workflow notes
- Documented best practices and patterns for adding new tokens/payloads
